Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villager', 3: 'Screw you! You filthy "heroes"!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Don't cry on the ground. Man up a little, will you? How's the potion collection going, Camu, Karenina?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Why are you the one giving orders?!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After learning that recovery potions could make the trip a lot easier, Vera started collecting them from every household.'}
{2: 'This is way too much.', 3: '11', 4: "Don't we already have more than enough?", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is that sympathy from you? I knew you were a doormat long ago...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's the more the merrier when it comes to potions. Who knows what will happen next?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We didn't take anything other than recovery potions. No money, no weapon, nothing valuable at all. I say we are actually very good people.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'No. We are no different from the bandits.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Bandits take things without paying, but Karenina left some money in every home. Well, we didn't know how much exactly we should pay, but at least we paid. ", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'When did you notice?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh Karenina, you can never be a bad guy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I never wanted to!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Camu and Karenina soon returned with lots of recovery potions. Vera then divided them in half and put them into her own bag and Karenina's bag."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Good, now let's move to the next village.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are we still doing this?', 3: '21', 4: "Aren't we supposed to go for the Demon Generals?", 5: '22'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Of course. I can heal, so I don't really need potions myself, but I just love taking things away from others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The Demon General's Castle is just after the next village. Whether you like it or not, we will go through that village regardless.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villager', 3: 'You will not do anything you want, minions of the King!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't mind you calling us minions, but at least show some respect for your King.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just when Vera was about to leave with the team, a few guard robots from the village stopped them, trying to take revenge on the team for justice.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villager', 3: 'The King is only interested in his weird experiments. He had done nothing except killing Demons!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Your country is such a mess... But that has nothing to do with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I only need to win. Out of my way!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera drew her weapon and charged toward the guards.'}
